body:
Hello, everyone. I just want to start this off with a solid apology. Recently I've been fairly inactive, and I'd like to inform you why.

As many of you reading know, school in the United States recently began again, starting more High School work for me. All of the work has been fairly overwhelming, and I haven't really had any time to get online. And when I do, it's not for as long as I'd wish I could be on for.

Secondly, football. I recently started football for my first year this year, and it takes up my entire day if you include school. Here's my schedule:

6:10 AM, wake up call.
7:40 AM, school begins.
2:10 PM, school gets out. 
2:45-5:00 PM, football practice. 
5-15 approximate home arrival time.

From there I do homework until dinner (usually around 6:30-7:00), then after dinner I continue homework. After that, I go online. But I go to bed at 10:30 to give myself a good amount of sleep, so I don't have much time online. Plus my dad's computer I used to use recently blew up, (died) so I can't play 4 out of the 7 days because I have no computer to use anymore. 

So this thread was just to inform you on why I've been inactive lately. I'll try to become more active soon.

-JakeFromStateFarm

title: Story of my inactivity.

replies.body:
That's totally fine, man. Most people don't even say why they've been inactive.

#SchoolIsMoreImportantThanGames

That's totally fine, man. Most people don't even say why they've been inactive.

#SchoolIsMoreImportantThanGames

anyways, apology accepted. :D

replies.body: Thanks for all of the positivity everyone! I'm just glad you all understand, and I'll be trying to be more active from now on.

replies.body:
Well, you should try to enjoy all the time you spend with us on Avicus <3

I know what your school schedule feels like; I get out at 2:45 three days of the week to go to sports (if anyone is wondering, I am a fencer), and I get back from that at about 6:30. It's hard, but manageable.

replies.body:
It's fine, Jake. School takes up almost all my time as well, but I imagine your schedule is much more packed.
Don't forget to make some time to get in-game! ;)
